attributes.action: Abolish stamp duty on 1st homes. Let families buy a home and be able to move for work without being taxed, please.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
First time buyers typically have to pay stamp duty of 1%. To buy a family home in most parts of England you are in the 3% stamp duty range (a tax of at least £7,500 to move house!)
Please stop taxing those people/famlies buying and selling their only home. 
Yes, tax 2nd property purchases. You should also move the stamp duty bands in line with inflation.
You might even make the labour market more flexible if you stop taxing 1st homes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
